title: CBDT Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026: Public Comment Window Closes Today!
content:
# CBDT Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026: Public Comment Window Closes Today!

Ek important update hai. The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) ne Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026 aur Forms ke liye public feedback ki window close hone ki date announce ki thi. This is a crucial step before the new Income-tax Act, 2025, takes effect from April 1, 2026.

The CBDT had invited comments and suggestions from all stakeholders and the public to ensure a participative and effective process for framing the subordinate legislation.

*   **Topic:** Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026 and accompanying Forms.
*   **Purpose:** These draft rules aim to operationalize the new Income-tax Act, 2025, focusing on simplification, reducing litigation, and easing compliance burden.
*   **Release Date:** The draft rules and forms were released on February 7, 2026, for public consultation.
*   **Public Comment Window:** The window for submitting feedback was open for 15 days.
*   **Closing Date:** The deadline for submitting your valuable feedback is today, **February 22, 2026**.
*   **Key Highlights:** The draft proposes a significant reduction in the number of rules from 511 to 333 and forms from 399 to 190, aiming for a more streamlined tax framework.

This is a final call for all tax professionals and members of the public to provide their considered feedback.
